Packages
com.shadowstruggles  
com.shadowstruggles.battle The game's logic layer, responsible for the core functionalities without concern for the data itself.
com.shadowstruggles.characters  
com.shadowstruggles.data The data access layer, responsible for the communication with external means of storage.
com.shadowstruggles.games Battle samples (classes derived from BattleScreen).
com.shadowstruggles.object2d This package contains the visual components of the game, including cards, energy/life bars and the map, for example.
com.shadowstruggles.screens The visual layer.
